newsitem.title: USA: Mossimo stock plunges on earnings warning.
newsitem.headline: Mossimo stock plunges on earnings warning.

text.p: The stock of Mossimo Inc., a designer of men's and women's activewear, plummeted Monday after the company said it expected to post disappointing third quarter earnings.
Mossimo was down $10.50 at $30.50 in afternoon trading after a delayed opening on the New York Stock Exchange. The stock hit a low of $26.25 in earlier trading.
The company forecast that it will earn between 14 cents and 16 cents a share in the latest quarter, compared with earnings of 21 cents a year ago.
Wall Street analysts were expected Mossimo to earn 24 cents to 28 cents a share. In the second quarter, Mossimo had net income of $4 million, or 26 cents per share.
The company blamed the weak results on high production costs that hurt its profit margins for men's and women's autumn sportswear collections.
